:• '''1300Mbps''' - 3SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''600Mbps''' - 3SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan., 256QAM) = '''''1900 Mbps'' class'''
{{TagLine|SURFboard Cable Modem & Wi-Fi Router}} :{{ProductPage|http://www.arris.com/surfboard/products/wi-fi-cable-modems/sbg6900-ac/}}{{SupportPage|vendor=Arris|p=a0ha000000REH6mAAH}} DOCSIS 3.0 16x4{{CableModemSpec |down_c=16 |up_c=4 }} "U62C024100 REV.0 GP" is silkscreened on the board in the FCC photos.
